title: Urgot in LCS
body:
So it begins...

(for future reference, Urgot is the 4th least popular champion in LoL right now, just like Viktor once was before being picked, let's see where this goes =P )

replies.body: You misspelled Urgod
It's "new" as of this season.

> [{quoted}](name=Devi Freak Mint,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ABNKMsyu,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-21T22:49:24.156+0000)
>
> It's "new" as of this season.

he's been picked like 20 times in china and korea this season

there's even a specific comp named "Juggermaw" since he's extremely popular there
JuggerMaw? What does the "jugger" part means in this case?

> [{quoted}](name=JevelFaithful,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ABNKMsyu,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-22T01:23:12.523+0000)
>
> JuggerMaw? What does the "jugger" part means in this case?

He is the front line of the team, because the comp involves so many champions with shields / buffs.

1.- Pick Kog'Maw
2.- Pick Lulu to go top if you can
3.- Choose between Janna and Nami.
4.- A marksman for midlane does wonders.
5.- Nidalee in the jungle is a good option too.

Focus on peeling for Kog'Maw and watch how your main damage source is also your tank. Profit.

> [{quoted}](name=Skia Asteri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ABNKMsyu,comment-id=000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-03-22T02:47:48.106+0000)
>
> He is the front line of the team, because the comp involves so many champions with shields / buffs.

you mean something like

lulu top
orianna mid
lee sin jung
janna sp
kogmaw adc 

??
That looks hilarious. Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=JevelFaithful,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ABNKMsyu,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-22T01:23:12.523+0000)
>
> JuggerMaw? What does the "jugger" part means in this case?

juggernaut

since he looks like a big artillery tank when ulted by Lulu + he's kinda tanky thanks to Lulu+Janna/Nami+Nunu/Nida jungle

Oh I get it another way. Makes more sense. 
That just got even funnier.

Fine. You got me.

It may have something to do with my Lulu main agenda to make people pick Kog'maw again.
Or twisted Fate, or vlad, or jax, or yorick, or ugot, or nunu, or olaf, or zac, or udyr, or hecarim, or nautilus
where was the vlad/hec/olaf/sion/zac played? those sound really good.
You're missing out {{champion:131}}

I've always loved Urgot. He is strange, but amazing. He reduces the damage they deal with his basic attacks and Q, he has a lock-on skill on a 2 second CD, when he has his shield activated, his basic attacks and Q slow, he reduces ARMOR, and he swaps places with a target, that gives him 120 **Armor & Magic Resist**.

When he was free, I played him constantly. He has so much to offer and he is so fun.
But Urgot is balanced, Viktor is ridiculously strong, even before the rework.
Viktor was mediocre before the rework. After the rework, however, he's a little above balanced. Just a little too strong.

If he was OP, he wouldn't have been so underplayed.

Viktor is fine.

Won't be long before champs like Darius are re-discovered as well.  They're fantastic anti-assassins and personal bodyguards, but they just haven't meshed with the mentality the LoL community has had for so long.

He's overpowered on Dominion. I'm not surprised to see him played on SR after that W buff. If they do nerf him, they should probably hit his W mana scaling, that's what's making him so strong now compared to before. The ulti buff is nice, sure, but the W buff is huge.
I wouldn't mind seeing Urgods Hyper Kinetic Position Reversing across the Rift though :D

Only if they have the batttlecast skin.

All the other skins are vomit inducing, I can't really look at them for more than 10 seconds before I have to leave.
Well, I just want to see him more. Plus he is a good counter to Zed. Now he can't just jump into 4-5 people, mash his keyboard and get away cleanly with the kill.
